summary: A singer/dancer, while on tour, starts hallucinating and having visions of having been there before.
cast: Himesh Reshammiya|Urmila Matondkar|Shweta Kumar|Dino Morea|Raj Babbar|Danny Denzongpa|Gulshan Grover|Rohini Hattangadi|Asrani|Smita Bansal|Sudhir Dalvi|Jenny Freeman|Daniel Green|Imran Hasnee|Bakhtiyaar Irani|Dinesh Lamba|Tarina Patel|Achyut Potdar|Shiva Rindani|Himani Shivpuri
title: Karzzzz
